name: Crumbling Bridge
description: Beat Plan A, part 2 without pressing the jump button.

name: Frozen Bridge
description: Touch only ice tiles during the Way Back, part 3. (The very first tile won't count against you.)

name: Frozen Creek
description: Touch only ice tiles during the Way Back, part 4.

name: Bunny Hop
description: As the Bunny, finish Level X without pressing the jump button.

name: A True Engineer
description: As the Angel, only dash once during Plan C, part 11.

name: Leap of Faith
description: As the Pastafarian, beat Plan A, part 3 in only one jump.
